feed.title: Google Cloud: Apigee Analytics
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Apigee Analytics

entry.content: On November 17, 2025 we released an updated version of Apigee Analytics.
entry.summary: An updated version of Apigee Analytics was released on November 17, 2025.
entry.title: Announcement: Apigee Analytics Updated

entry.content:
Support for aggregate data in Error Code Analysis, Cache Performance, and Target Performance charts

Announcing support for viewing aggregate data in the Error Code Analysis, Cache Performance, and Target Performance Analytics dashboards.

For information on the Analytics dashboards, see Use the Analytics dashboards.
entry.summary: We're happy to announce that you can now view aggregate data in the Error Code Analysis, Cache Performance, and Target Performance Analytics dashboards. This enhancement allows for a more comprehensive understanding of your API performance.
entry.title: Feature: Aggregate Data Support in Analytics

entry.content: On November 10, 2025 we released an updated version of Apigee.
entry.summary: An updated version of Apigee was released on November 10, 2025.
entry.title: Announcement: Updated Apigee Version Released

entry.content:
Support for new Apigee Analytics regions

This release introduces Apigee Analytics support for these new regions: Hong Kong (asia-east2) and São Paulo (southamerica-east1).

NOTE: Apigee Advanced API Security does not support these new regions at this time.

For a list of all of the supported Analytics regions, see Available Apigee API Analytics regions.
entry.summary: Apigee Analytics now supports Hong Kong (asia-east2) and São Paulo (southamerica-east1). Note that Apigee Advanced API Security does not support these regions yet.
entry.title: Feature: New Regions for Apigee Analytics

entry.content: On June 23, 2025 we released an updated version of Apigee.
entry.summary: An updated version of Apigee was released on June 23, 2025.
entry.title: Announcement: Apigee Update Released

entry.content:
Addition of AppGroup-specific Analytics dimensions for Custom Reports

This release introduces two new AppGroups Analytics dimensions: AppGroup Name and AppGroup App Name.

Use these dimensions with custom reports and report jobs to group metrics by a specific AppGroup or a specific app within an AppGroup.

For additional information see Analytics dimensions and Creating and managing custom reports.
entry.summary: You can now add AppGroup Name and AppGroup App Name dimensions to your custom reports. This allows for more granular analysis of API usage by grouping metrics specific to an AppGroup or an app within an AppGroup.
entry.title: Feature: New Analytics Dimensions for AppGroups

entry.content: On June 16, 2025 we released an updated version of Apigee Analytics and the Apigee UI.
entry.summary: An updated version of Apigee Analytics and the Apigee UI was released on June 16, 2025.
entry.title: Announcement: Apigee Update

entry.content:
Starting with this release, the API proxy performance dashboard includes aggregate metrics such as the average TPS (transactions per second) with each chart.

For information and usage instructions for the API proxy performance dashboard, see the API proxy performance dashboard customer documentation.
entry.summary: The API proxy performance dashboard now displays aggregate metrics like average transactions per second (TPS) on each chart, providing a clearer view of API performance.
entry.title: Feature: New Aggregate Metrics in API Proxy Performance Dashboard
